explains: n. 亮光漆，清漆；虚饰；光泽面
vt. 装饰，粉饰；在……上涂清漆；使……有光泽
wordGroup: baking varnish 烘干清漆，烤干清漆
nail varnish 指甲油（等于nail polish）
gloss varnish 上光漆；有光清漆

sentences.en: The varnish takes a few hours to harden.
sentences.cn: 清漆需要几个小时才能干透。

sentences.en: You can buy brushes, paint, varnish and suchlike there.
sentences.cn: 你在那儿能买到刷子、油漆、清漆之类的东西。

sentences.en: Research showed it was the same ordinary varnish used on furniture.
sentences.cn: 研究表明，它和家具上使用的是一样的普通清漆。
